charges.charge_description: 42:1383a(a)(2) FALSE STATEMENT FOR USE IN DETERMINING SOCIAL SECURITY SUPPLEMENTAL SECURITY INCOME BENEFITS(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to count III of the Indictment and was committed to the custody of Bureau of Prisons for 6 months; 3 years supervised release with special conditions; $100 Special Assessment; $48,579.00 restitution.
Counts I, II, IV and V of Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States.
